title: The Visions of Ichabod X
description: Who is Ichabod X? Is it true that he can see visions of the future fate of our endangered planet Earth? Gary Crew (author of the award winning The Watertower) and artistic genius Paul O’Sullivan invite the reader to explore—and possibly discover—the meaning behind the haunting, futuristic visions of Ichabod X.
author: Gary Crew
